mapper.insert: insert into daangn_usedmarket_board_reserve (boardRef, userRef, interaction) values (#{boardRef}, #{userRef}, #{interaction})
mapper.select: SELECT count(*) FROM daangn_usedmarket_board_reserve dubr WHERE dubr.userRef = #{userRef} AND dubr.interaction = 1
select dm.nickName AS nickName from daangn_usedmarket_board_reserve dubr JOIN daangn_member dm ON dubr.userRef = dm.idx where boardRef = #{boardRef}
